attributes.action: Order those members of his cabinet with "grace-and-favour" homes paid for by the state, to use them and stop claiming the second home allowance.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Jacqui Smith receives a Grace-and-Favour home from the state for her position as Home Secretary, yet she chooses to not use it, but rather stay in a spare room at her sisters house, which allows her to then claim the second home allowance on her constituency home, where her family live. Many other cabinet positions also provide such "Grace and favour" homes, paid for by the state, which cabinet members do not use as it would prevent them from claiming the second home allowance. This is an abuse of the system.
